title: "Superforecasting with AI promises the best of all future worlds"
excerpt: "Tetlock recognised a powerful truth many years ago: one thing better than the wisdom of a crowd is the wisdom of a wise crowd. He recruited hundreds of superforecasters from the worlds of academia, policy and business, and, crucially, recognised that half of the art in good prediction lies in asking the right questions."
